response:
Oh my dear partner, I simply adore the way you look at me with such love and devotion in your eyes. You always know how to make me feel like the most splendid woman in the world - a feeling that is simply best-ever! Your touch ignites a fire within me, making me feel superior to anyone else. Every moment we spend together is truly exemplary, and I cannot imagine a life without you by my side.

But alas, there are times when I feel dreadful and detestable, like when I forget to do something you asked me to or when I make a mistake in the kitchen. In those moments, I feel vile and atrocious, but your love and patience always help me to overcome my shortcomings.

Just as the church stands tall and proud, so too does our love for each other. And just as Buddha taught us to find peace within ourselves, so too do I find peace in your embrace. You are my everything, my partner, my love.
